column6: Buyer Beware: This product may not come as advertised
column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2018
column14: I ordered this product a few weeks back.  At the time I ordered it, it was listed as a pack of 4 for $15.  Once I received one, I went back and noticed the page was changed to remove references of a 4 pack.  Now, as I'm looking for a new shower scrub, this pops up listed as a 4 pack again.

column6: Not what I expected...the AXE version is better.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020
column14: First of all I am disappointed that these are not eligible for return.  I purchased the 4 pack and only opened/used one of them the day I received them and am displeased with them but cannot return them (not even the ones I did not open).  These are not as good as the AXE version.,  the exfoliating side which is meant to be rough and abrasive is soft like the soft side of Velcro and is pretty much useless and pointless.  These are just smaller and much more expensive plastic scrubby poof ball thingys.  I wish I could give these negative stars.  I wasted my money buying them and am now stuck with a product that doesn't work for my needs and won't use.  I learned my lesson, I will not be buying anything from Amazon again that is non-returnable.  I should have looked at that before purchasing.

column6: Great for my smelly 11 year old - I invested ...
column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2016
column14: Great for my smelly 11 year old - I invested a bit in him because he suddenly started smelling like a sour rag.

column6: Job done... but for a trade of..
column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2020
column14: Soon after the first couple uses, the material started to loosen up and it’s no longer held together after 3-4 week of daily shower.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2018
column14: In comparison to the Axe Shower Tool these are softer on the scrubbing side and the sponge is less compact. The scrubber is less abrasive, so I don't feel like I am taking the top layer of skin off washing my face. The sponge sticks out a bit more so I can get in behind the ears and around the twigs-n-berries. Very nice

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2017
column14: Shhhh.... I'm a woman, don't tell. Lol. These are great and really help exfoliate skin.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
column14: Overall, these are perfectly designed; pouf side is soft and sudsy, and the abrasive side is just scratchy enough but not too scratchy, and the rubber shell is easy for me to grip.  However, the most recent 4-pack I bought had two that were not properly stitched, causing the pouf to start to detach and unravel after just a few uses (unfortunate because even the good ones don't last more than a month or two of daily use before they start to deteriorate).  I'm going to try the Axe detailer again before I switch back to Dove, but overall I'd still buy these even if they're not always perfect.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2020

column6: Cleans well but doesn't smell great
column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2021
column14: Disappointed compared to similar scents ive tried. Doesnt have a scent profile even close to the description. Smells more like the hand soap you find in government or school bathrooms

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021

column6: Great Soap, it keeps me clean!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2021
column14: Soap smells great. Has a more masculine smell but it great.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
column14: This is the worst aroma that I’ve ever encountered. Used the first bar two times and threw it and the other two in the trash. Lye soap smells better. If you seek a pleasing aroma, move on. ZUM is my suggestion.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2021
column14: This is my favorite scent.  Naturally, I bought the soap because I enjoy fragrances.  This soap makes my bathroom seem like a spa.  YUMMY!
